plot: Dorf is out in left field getting ready to catch the winning hit when a fan taunts him with insults and throws items at him.
title: Dorf and the Angry Fan
plot_es: Dorf is out in left field getting ready to catch the winning hit when a fan taunts him with insults and throws items at him.
plot_en: Dorf is out in left field getting ready to catch the winning hit when a fan taunts him with insults and throws items at him.
